By identifying behaviors of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best innovatorsÃ¢â‚¬â€from leaders at Amazon and Apple to those at Google, Skype, and Virgin GroupÃ¢â‚¬â€the authors outline five discovery skills that distinguish innovative entrepreneurs and executives from ordinary managers: Associating, Questioning, Observing, Networking, and Experimenting.
